info.name: OSS-New-Deployment-FSP-Setup-DFSPS
info.description:
Purpose: Perform Golden path end-to-end testing on a deployed Mojaloop system

Contributors:
- Mowali
- Amar Ramachandran <amarnath.ramachandran@modusbox.com>
- Georgi Georgiev <georgi.georgiev@modusbox.com>
- Juan Correa <juan.correa@modusbox.com>
- Miguel deBarros <miguel.debarros@modusbox.com>
- Nico Duvenage <nico.duvenage@modusbox.com>
- Sam Kummary <sam@modusbox.com>
- Sri Miryala <sridevi.miriyala@modusbox.com>
- Steven Oderayi <steven.oderayi@modusbox.com>
- valentin genev <valentin.genev@modusbox.com>
- Vijay Guthi <vijaya.guthi@modusbox.com>

item.name: Add initial position and limits - payerfsp

Add payerfsp callback - PARTICIPANT PUT Batch Error

Create Party record for MSISDN 333333333 on simulator for Payee

request.description:
Set the Proxy URIs for a specific FSP. This will allow the switch to re-direct the incoming Quote requests to the respective FSP.

*Note: connectorPort has been deprecated and is no longer used, but still required in the request.
